_source.text: A 3 days 2 night trip can't get any better than this - food craving all the day in the island.

_source.text: After doing the Sitz bath, dry the area gently and apply a topical cream such as Lotrimin (I find the athlete's foot or jock itch creams work better than the ones made for women as there are fewer irritating ingredients but the same active ingredient) into the crevices.
